data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during BELLONA cruise from London to Rio de Janeiro started at 1792-08-14
Ship: Bellona, Voyage: London - Rio De Janeiro, 1st Observer: Matthew Boyd (Captain), Company: EIC
